snippet: K. Pacho, a casual Mexican restaurant, opened less than two months after its predecessor, the expensive Two Steak and Sushi Den, closed in January.
abstract: Joanne Starkey reviews K Pacho Cocina and Tequila restaurant in New Hyde Park (Metropolitan/Long Island).
